text: Pero Kvrgić (4 March 1927 − 23 December 2020) was a Croatian actor. Kvrgić was born in Srpske Moravice. He co-founded the Gavella Drama Theatre in 1953. He retired in 1988. His play Stilske vježbe, a Croatian version of Exercises in Style, is well known and has been produced since 1970. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Croatian actors
title: Pero Kvrgić
